channel.title: Pi error
channel.description:
I get this error after I updated my castle wars stuff, it's telling me to either make this methods static, or non-static, how do I make them non-static?
src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3070: cannot find symbol symbol : variable saradominWait location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars .remove(Server.castleWars.sarado minWait ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3069: cannot find symbol symbol : variable saradominWait location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars Server.castleWars.saradominWait ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3073: cannot find symbol symbol : variable saradomin location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars Server.castleWars.saradomin.remove(Server.castle Wars.saradomin ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3073: cannot find symbol symbol : variable saradomin location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars Server.castleWars.saradomin.remove(Server.castle Wars.saradomin ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3079: cannot find symbol symbol : variable zamorakWait location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars .remove(Server.castleWars.zamora kWait ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3078: cannot find symbol symbol : variable zamorakWait location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars Server.castleWars.zamorakWait ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3082: cannot find symbol symbol : variable zamorak location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars Server.castleWars.zamorak.remove(Server.castleWa rs.zamorak ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerAssistant.java:3082: cannot find symbol symbol : variable zamorak location: class server.model.minigames.CastleWars Server.castleWars.zamorak.remove(Server.castleWa rs.zamorak ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:89: non-static variable playerHat can not be referenced from a static context } else if (player.playerEquipment[Client.playerHat] > 0 || player.player Equipment[Client.playerCape] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:89: non-static variable playerCape ca nnot be referenced from a static context } else if (player.playerEquipment[Client.playerHat] > 0 || player.player Equipment[Client.playerCape] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:187: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipment[Client.playerWeapon] = -1; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:188: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipmentN[Client.playerWeapon] = 0; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:201: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context if (player.playerEquipment[Client.playerWeapon] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:226: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipment[Client.playerWeapon] = flagId; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:227: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.playerEquipmentN[Client.playerWeapon] = 1; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:228: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context player.getItems().updateSlot(Client.playerWeapon); ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:267: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context if (player.playerEquipment[Client.playerWeapon] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:279: non-static variable playerWeapon cannot be referenced from a static context if (player.playerEquipment[Client.playerWeapon] > 0) { ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:470: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwGames location: class server.model.players.Client player.cwGames++; ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:473: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwKills location: class server.model.players.Client player.sendMessage("[CASTLE WARS] Kills: " + player.cwKills + " Dea ths: " + player.cwDeaths + " Games Played: " + player.cwGames + "."); ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:473: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwDeaths location: class server.model.players.Client player.sendMessage("[CASTLE WARS] Kills: " + player.cwKills + " Dea ths: " + player.cwDeaths + " Games Played: " + player.cwGames + "."); ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:473: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwGames location: class server.model.players.Client player.sendMessage("[CASTLE WARS] Kills: " + player.cwKills + " Dea ths: " + player.cwDeaths + " Games Played: " + player.cwGames + "."); ^ src\server\model\minigames\CastleWars.java:544: cannot find symbol symbol : variable cwKills location: class server.model.players.Client player.sendMessage("[@red@CASTLE WARS@bla@] Kills: @red@ " + player. cwKills + " @bla@Deaths:@red@ " + player.cwDeaths + "@bla@."); ^ item.title: Pi error
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

I get this error after I updated my castle wars stuff, it’s telling me to either make this methods static, or non-static, how do I make them non-static?
